languages.text: "Одна из граней имморталиума есть предложение дружбы. Если ваш друг намерен принять лишь ее, по традиции он должен обозначить это в личной беседе с дарителем".

traits.locale_text: "Одна из граней имморталиума есть предложение дружбы. Если ваш друг намерен принять лишь ее, по традиции он должен обозначить это в личной беседе с дарителем".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."
languages.original_text: "Одна из граней имморталиума есть предложение дружбы. Если ваш друг намерен принять лишь ее, по традиции он должен обозначить это в личной беседе с дарителем".

traits.locale_text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Una de las facetas del inmortalium consiste en una propuesta de amistad. Si su amigo solamente pretende aceptar esa parte, entonces siguiendo la tradición debe informar de ello al interesado en una conversación privada».
languages.original_text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."

traits.locale_text: «Una de las facetas del inmortalium consiste en una propuesta de amistad. Si su amigo solamente pretende aceptar esa parte, entonces siguiendo la tradición debe informar de ello al interesado en una conversación privada».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「イモータリウムの一面は友情の申し出です。あなたのご友人がこの面だけを受け取るつもりなのであれば、彼は伝統にのっとり、贈り主と個人的な会話を通じてそのことを伝えなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."

traits.locale_text: 「イモータリウムの一面は友情の申し出です。あなたのご友人がこの面だけを受け取るつもりなのであれば、彼は伝統にのっとり、贈り主と個人的な会話を通じてそのことを伝えなければなりません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “永生花其中一个含义是邀请建立友谊。如果你的朋友打算只接受这部分的含义，那么根据传统，他必须与送礼之人私下谈话，告知此事。”
languages.original_text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."

traits.locale_text: “永生花其中一个含义是邀请建立友谊。如果你的朋友打算只接受这部分的含义，那么根据传统，他必须与送礼之人私下谈话，告知此事。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « L'immortalium symbolise, entre autres, une proposition d'amitié. Si votre {mf|ami|amie} n'accepte que cette facette du cadeau, la tradition exige qu'{mf|il|elle} en informe l'autre personne au cours d'une conversation privée. »
languages.original_text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."

traits.locale_text: « L'immortalium symbolise, entre autres, une proposition d'amitié. Si votre {mf|ami|amie} n'accepte que cette facette du cadeau, la tradition exige qu'{mf|il|elle} en informe l'autre personne au cours d'une conversation privée. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eine der Facetten des Immortaliums ist ein Angebot der Freundschaft. Wenn Euer Freund beabsichtigt, nur diesen Teil zu akzeptieren, dann muss er das der Tradition zufolge in einer privaten Unterredung mit dem Schenkenden kundtun."
languages.original_text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."

traits.locale_text: "Eine der Facetten des Immortaliums ist ein Angebot der Freundschaft. Wenn Euer Freund beabsichtigt, nur diesen Teil zu akzeptieren, dann muss er das der Tradition zufolge in einer privaten Unterredung mit dem Schenkenden kundtun."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."

languages.text: "İmmortaliumlarla sunulan seçeneklerden biri de arkadaşlıktır. Arkadaşın sadece bu yönünü kabul etme niyetindeyse o hâlde geleneğe göre alıcıyla baş başa bir sohbette bunu ona bildirmelidir."
languages.original_text: "One of the facets of an immortalium is an offer of friendship. If your friend intends to accept only this part, then he must, by tradition, make this known in a private conversation with the giver."

traits.locale_text: "İmmortaliumlarla sunulan seçeneklerden biri de arkadaşlıktır. Arkadaşın sadece bu yönünü kabul etme niyetindeyse, o hâlde geleneğe göre alıcıyla baş başa bir sohbette bunu ona ilan etmelidir."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
